backend/main.mo: Defines product, order, and user-profile types with access control, manages state maps, and provides APIs for profiles, shop initialization, and product/order operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a requirement to ensure the CMF earbuds product remains published across deployments and upgrades.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light and dark themes using a warm OKLCH palette.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/api/adminProductHooks.ts: React Query hooks for admin product CRUD and publish status updates with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/api/authHooks.ts: Provides a React Query hook to check if the current caller is an admin.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized query key definitions for products, orders, and admin APIs.
frontend/src/api/shopHooks.ts: React Query hooks for storefront product fetching, order creation, and shop initialization.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and global layout, wrapping all pages in a CartProvider.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Renders an order summary showing line items and subtotal formatted in INR.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Access‑denied UI with an admin‑only warning and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AsyncSt: Provides a wrapper for loading, error, empty, and content states with optional retry and a loading spinner component.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer using centralized content, including brand info, quick links, contact text, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Builds the site header with navigation, cart button, mobile menu, branding, and optional admin link.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product card with image, name, description, price, stock, and an add‑to‑cart button.
Formats a product description into paragraphs and key‑value rows by splitting lines.
Shows a responsive grid of ProductCard components or an empty message if no products exist.
Renders a main product image with selectable thumbnails and a fallback placeholder on errors.
Provides a search input and category selector for filtering products.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines centralized editable site content and its structure for branding, navigation, and page text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom container styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders About and Contact sections using site content, including credits and an email card.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, creating, editing, and publishing products with identity and admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart with item management, quantity updates, and empty-cart handling.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays products for a selected category with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Manages checkout flow with form validation, order creation, and success confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page that loads products, initializes the shop if empty, highlights featured items, and renders hero, categories, and product sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail view fetching a single product, showing gallery, details, stock, quantity input, and add‑to‑cart logic.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shop listing page that filters products by category and search query and displays them with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/store/cart.ts: Pure cart utilities for loading, saving, and mutating cart items plus calculating subtotal and item count.
frontend/src/store/CartProvider.tsx: React context provider managing cart state with add, remove, update, clear, subtotal, and item count, persisted via localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility for formatting numbers as INR currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Maps product IDs to image arrays and provides helpers to retrieve all or primary images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, including versioning, features, architectural notes, known issues, and storefront requirements for The Lens website. It defines existing features, metadata, and configuration for build planning.
